Test Name: Neural Epidermal Growth Factor-Like 1 (NELL-1) Protein Immunostain
Purpose: To detect and visualize Neural Epidermal Growth Factor-Like 1 protein expression in tissue specimens via immunohistochemistry.
Container: Paraffin tissue block or positively charged microscope slide
Equipment: Microtome, automatic or manual slide immunostainer, humidified chamber, microscope, antigen retrieval heating device
